title: not possible to use pictures app/view with more than a few photos
body:
i have a similar issue mr. hook has [1] - when you select pictures from the menu, and try to enter a sub-folder, you don't get a pictures preview, but something like in the attachment.

i quote hook:

"on a fresh install, i’ve uploaded/synced three folders with pictures to my owncloud. they work just fine in the files view and the folder previews look ok in the pictures view/app as well.

the issue is that when i click on a gallery/folder in the gallery app, except the smallest one (13 items = 7 mib altogether), the other two don’t work (51 items = 24 mib altogether; 90 items = 74 mib altogether). the same folders actually worked on 4.0.x on my last install.

reproducable: always

outcome:
- after the php-fpm process finally stops, i get just a blank page
- sometimes though, i even get a 504
- never do i see get to see the pictures

expected outcome:
- see the pictures and navigate them normally.

oc: 4.5.5
os: gentoo gnu/linux
php: 5.4 using php-fpm and xcache
db: sqlite

relevant php.ini:

memory_limit = 64m

max_execution_time = 30

max_input_time = 60"

just like hook, i have oc 4.5.5.

i can see this message in my log:

php message: php fatal error:  allowed memory size of 134217728 bytes exhausted (tried to allocate 18842 bytes) in /var/www/owncloud/lib/image.php on line 419" while reading response header from upstream, client...

![broken-pictures-preview](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/3213538/84621/cc38c5e6-641a-11e2-8add-a550d5d11c51.png)



[1] http://apps.owncloud.com/kb/?kbid=1816
